org.treetank

Class CoreTestHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.treetank.CoreTestHelper

  • public final class CoreTestHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for offering convenient usage of Sessions for test cases. This includes instantiation of databases plus resources.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Nested Class Summary

      Paths where the data is stored to.

      • getFakedStructure

        public static final org.treetank.io.IBackendReader getFakedStructure(int[] offsets)
                                                              throws org.treetank.exception.TTIOException
        Getting a fake structure for testing consisting of different arranged buckets. This structure starts with the key 1 and incrementally sets a new bucketkey for the defined offsets in the indirectbuckets to simulate different versions and node-offsets. The key retrieved thereby has always the value 6 (1 (starting) + 5 (number of indirect layers)
        Parameters:
        offsets - an array with offsets internally of the tree.
        Returns:
        a IBackendReader-mock
        Throws:
        org.treetank.exception.TTIOException
